thread.section_title: The Benjamin - UPDATED 2017 Hotel Reviews & Price Comparison (New York City) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Great location and friendly staff
thread.title_full: Great location and friendly staff - Review of The Benjamin, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: GattoViziato
title: Great location and friendly staff
text: This is a nice boutique hotel with a great staff that is always available to offer assistance or just to provide you a compliment. The rooms have a nice decor which allows a guest to have a relaxing evening. My king size be was comfortable, where I was able to have a good night sleep. The bathroom was clean and had the amenities that would expect from the a hotel of this level. The best part of this hotel is the location. You can't go wrong.
